name: Illegal Alien
description:
Game Description:
Lumpy the alien is stranded on Earth, somehow got spotted by the public and being wanted now. Lumpy must run and sneak his way through the airport with his Telekinesis and Mimicking power to catch a flight home!

Inquiries: psychicnugget@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NuggetPsychic
Website: https://psychicnugget.wixsite.com/illegalalien

Here are the amazing Psychic Nugget Team who together built this game:

Also thanks to our composer from Melbourne Polytechnic, Nicholas Clark to compose the amazing music in-game, and our lecturer Andrew Trevillian and whoever help out testing the game for their professional input and feedback.

Last but not least! We also want to thank YOU for playing our game!!!

ALL WE WANT IS YOU!!! THE AMAZING PEOPLE!!!
